app.title: Encontrar - Social Pairing
app.name: Encontrar
app.tagline: Premium social pairing for university students

hero.title: Find Your Perfect University Match
hero.subtitle: Premium social pairing designed exclusively for university students. Connect through intelligent matching and meaningful conversations.
hero.copyright: © 2025 Encontrar. Experimental social pairing for the next generation.

intelligentMatching.title: Intelligent Matching
intelligentMatching.description: Our advanced algorithm considers your interests, personality, and preferences to find your ideal match.

universityNetwork.title: University Network
universityNetwork.description: Connect exclusively with verified university students in your area for authentic relationships.

premiumExperience.title: Premium Experience
premiumExperience.description: Enjoy a curated, high-quality experience with meaningful connections and no endless swiping.

auth.validEmailError: Please enter a valid university email address
auth.codeSentSuccess: Verification code sent to your email

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.description: We take your privacy seriously and protect all your personal information with enterprise-grade security.

aiMatching.title: AI Matching
aiMatching.description: Our advanced algorithm analyzes your preferences and personality to find the most compatible matches.

qualityConnections.title: Quality Connections
qualityConnections.description: We focus on meaningful relationships with verified university students in your area.

idVerification.title: ID Verification
idVerification.uploadDescription: Please upload your student ID card for verification

verificationPending.title: Verification Pending
verificationPending.description: Your ID card is being reviewed by our team. This usually takes 24-48 hours.

profileForm.title: Profile Form
profileForm.completeDescription: Fill out your profile to help us find your perfect match

previewMatches.title: Preview Matches
previewMatches.reviewDescription: Check out potential matches and use the veto system

finalMatch.title: Final Match
finalMatch.matchDescription: We found your perfect match. Review their profile and decide.

confirmed.title: Match Confirmed!
confirmed.description: Both of you accepted the match. Here's their WeChat ID:
confirmed.startConversation: Start your conversation and enjoy getting to know each other!

profileForm.title: Complete Your Profile
profileForm.subtitle: Tell us about yourself to find your perfect match

recentTopics.label: Recent Conversation Topics
recentTopics.placeholder: What have you been talking about lately?
